definitions.definition: Intelligently analytical and concise . ( of a person or mental process )

subdefinitions.definition: Accurate and sharply focused . ( of an account )

definitions.definition: Quickly proceeding to judgment and forceful in expression . ( of an action )
examples: An incisive producer, who expressed vehement disapproval with my pitch upon my first sentence.

definitions.definition: Having the quality of incising , cutting , or penetrating , as with a sharp instrument ; trenchant.
Of or relating to the incisors .

main_definition: Intelligently analytical and concise . ( of a person or mental process )
secondary_definitions: Quickly proceeding to judgment and forceful in expression . ( of an action )
Having the quality of incising , cutting , or penetrating , as with a sharp instrument ; trenchant.
( anatomy , relational ) Of or relating to the incisors .
